page.title: 08Games Children Play
page.content: At Rivenhall School,all the children were surveyed to find out what hobbies and pastimes they enjoyed.During school time about half the girls prefered to stay indoors at playtime. The others played"Catch","Bulldog" and a game called "Fairytop".Almost all the boys surveyed prefered to be outside and play "Catch","It" and "Bulldog". After school activities varied a great deal.The younger girls tended to ride their bikes or to play with their dolls or friends in the park,whilst the older girls prefered sports like Badminton or watching television.The younger boys favourite pastimes included riding their bikes and playing with toy cars or Scalextric. The older boys tended to prefer to play tennis,snooker,football and rounders as well as bicycling.
